# [Interview #1126: Barnes & Noble (Newnan), Entry #63](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1126#63)

#### Question

Apparently thatâ€™s the southern continent, are we going to see the northern continent?

#### Brandon Sanderson

What, on Roshar? Roshar is only-- it is a pangaea. On Scadrial, there is a lot more going on, so you will see multiple different continents there.
